{"id":1471294260,"question_id":2661,"lang":"cpp","lang_name":"C++","time":"2Â months","timestamp":1733426973,"status":10,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"4 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/1471294260/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Smallest Missing Non-negative Integer After Operations","memory":"120.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\npublic:\n    int findSmallestInteger(vector<int>& nums, int value) {\n        vector<int> count(value, 0);\n        for(auto num:nums)\n            count[ ( num % value + value ) % value ]++;\n        int stop = 0;\n        for(int i=0; i<value; i++) {\n            if(count[i] < count[stop])\n                stop = i;\n        }\n        return value*count[stop] + stop;\n    }\n};","compare_result":"","title_slug":"smallest-missing-non-negative-integer-after-operations","has_notes":false,"flag_type":1}
